articles.author: Philip Pullella
articles.title: Former Pope Benedict breaks silence on celibacy debate after synod
articles.description: Former Pope Benedict, in a new book written with a conservative cardinal, defends priestly celibacy in the Catholic Church in what appears to be a strategically timed appeal to Pope Francis to not change the rules.
articles.content:
VATICAN CITY (Reuters) - Former Pope Benedict, in a new book written with a conservative cardinal, defends priestly celibacy in the Catholic Church in what appears to be a strategically timed appeal to Pope Francis to not change the rules. 
Benedict wrote th… [+2569 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Hexcel and Woodward combine in merger valued at over $6 bln
articles.description: Hexcel Corp , a composites technology company, and aircraft and industrial parts maker Woodward Inc said on Sunday they would combine in an all-stock merger of equals to create an integrated systems provider for the aerospace and industrial sectors.
articles.content: (Reuters) - Hexcel Corp (HXL.N), a composites technology company, and aircraft and industrial parts maker Woodward Inc (WWD.O) said on Sunday they would combine in an all-stock merger of equals to create an integrated systems provider for the aerospace and in… [+606 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Soccer-Real overcome Atletico in shootout to win Super Sup in Saudi Arabia
articles.description: Real Madrid beat city rivals Atletico Madrid 4-1 in a penalty shootout to win the first edition of the revamped Spanish Super Cup in Saudi Arabia following a goalless draw after extra time in a tense final on Sunday.
articles.content:
JEDDAH (Reuters) - Real Madrid beat city rivals Atletico Madrid 4-1 in a penalty shootout to win the first edition of the revamped Spanish Super Cup in Saudi Arabia following a goalless draw after extra time in a tense final on Sunday. 
Captain Sergio Ramos … [+1029 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Pearson warns 'job not done' as Watford escape relegation zone
articles.description: Watford escaped the Premier League relegation zone for the first time this season with a 3-0 win at Bournemouth on Sunday but manager Nigel Pearson, who has engineered a remarkable transformation since taking over, said the job is not done.
articles.content: LONDON (Reuters) - Watford escaped the Premier League relegation zone for the first time this season with a 3-0 win at Bournemouth on Sunday but manager Nigel Pearson, who has engineered a remarkable transformation since taking over, said the job is not done.… [+2725 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Colombia says police foil attempt to assassinate FARC leader Timochenko
articles.description: Colombian police thwarted an assassination attempt against Rodrigo Londono, former commander of the demobilized FARC rebels better known by his nom de guerre Timochenko, a senior official said Sunday.
articles.content:
BOGOTA (Reuters) - Colombian police thwarted an assassination attempt against Rodrigo Londono, former commander of the demobilized FARC rebels better known by his nom de guerre Timochenko, a senior official said Sunday.      
General Oscar Atehortua, directo… [+1868 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Iran issues more visas to Canada team investigating plane crash
articles.description: Iran has issued eight more visas to a team of Canadian officials in the wake of a fatal plane crash near Tehran and most members of the group should be in Tehran on Monday, Canadian Foreign Minister Francois-Philippe Champagne said on Sunday.
articles.content: OTTAWA (Reuters) - Iran has issued eight more visas to a team of Canadian officials in the wake of a fatal plane crash near Tehran and most members of the group should be in Tehran on Monday, Canadian Foreign Minister Francois-Philippe Champagne said on Sunda… [+884 chars]
